data.title: Cripple Bastards - Songs, Events and Music Stats
data.meta_description: Cripple Bastards: Listen to new and popular songs, find events, look into their stats and see who their fans are.
data.text:
Grindcore and metal band Cripple Bastards comes from Asti, Italy. The group is renowned for its powerful, fast-paced music with a raw, unashamed edge. Their music stands out for its breakneck pace, violent guitars, and gruff vocals that imply an aggressive and chaotic atmosphere.

The group has built a cult following in Italy's underground music scene over a number of years because to their tough style. Critics and fans alike have praised Cripple Bastards for their capacity to make music that is both emotionally resonant and thought-provoking. Their music reflects the rage and disgust that many people feel against the society around them, and their songs frequently address social and political concerns.

Overall, Cripple Bastards is a group that doesn't hesitate to experiment and upend conventional wisdom. Their music is proof of the ability of grindcore and heavy metal to generate strong feelings and spur social change.

Italian grindcore band Cripple Bastards, known for their ferocious and combative music, has a devoted fan base. They are known for such songs as "Malato Terminale," "Italia Di Merda," "Misantropo A Senso Unico," and "Non coinvolto." These tracks, which are frequently mentioned as fan favorites, demonstrate the band's raw intensity and caustic lyrics.

With its frantic guitar chords and quick-paced percussion, "Passi nel vuoto" is another memorable track. Extreme metal enthusiasts should definitely listen to this song because it features the band's distinctively loud vocals. Similar in intensity, the song "Dio e solo merda" calls for individual independence while criticizing organized religion in its lyrics.

Other well-known songs by Cripple Bastards include "Strage Di Ostacoli," "Morte da tossico," "Fumo Passivo," and "Il sentimento non e amore." Each of these tracks exhibits the band's distinct sound and unwavering commitment to quality music.

The brutal Grindcore sound and provocative lyrics of Cripple Bastards have helped them establish a solid reputation. These well-known songs are just a small sampling of the band's remarkable discography, and they will no doubt please extreme metal fans looking for something uncompromising and intense.

The Italian grindcore group Cripple Bastards released their most recent album, "La fine cresce da dentro," in 2018. The band's raw and uncompromising sound is displayed in the 14-track album's relentless assault of fast-paced, aggressive music. The lyrics, which touch on issues like political corruption and social injustice, are rife with fury and frustration. A few standout songs are "Malato Terminale," "Nervi Spaccati," and "Fumo Passivo."

In addition, the group produced a number of singles in 2018 such as "Crimine contro l'immagine," "Passi nel vuoto," "Non coinvolto," and "La memoria del dolore." These songs carry on the group's legacy of producing hard-hitting, politically motivated music that doesn't steer clear of contentious subjects.

Overall, Cripple Bastards' most recent album and songs demonstrate the group's capacity to write brutal, unforgiving grindcore that doesn't hold back. The band's commitment to creating quick, aggressive music that expresses the frustration and rage that many people feel in today's society will be valued by fans of the genre.

Cripple Bastards is an Italian grindcore band that has gained recognition for their exuberant live performances. The band has performed at some of the best festivals and venues all over the world, mesmerizing the crowd with their aggressive and powerful sound.

The Obscene Extreme Festival, which is renowned for its extreme metal performances, is one of the best festivals that Cripple Bastards have played at. Additionally, the group has performed at events like Maryland Deathfest, Metalitalia Festival, PitFest, and Venezia Hardcore Festival. The band has displayed their distinctive sound at several festivals, leaving the audience clamoring for more.

Additionally, Cripple Bastards has given performances in some of the best venues in Italy, such as the RCA Club and the Legend Club Milano. The band delivers its music with intensity and passion during their concerts in these locations, which have been nothing short of electrifying.

Overall, Cripple Bastards' intense performances have had a lasting effect on the metal and grindcore music scenes. They have a devoted fan base all around the world because to their distinctive sound and exhilarating live performances.
